mapper.insert: insert into myuser(uno, id, pwd, uname,phone) values(myuser_seq.nextVal, #{id} ,#{pwd},#{uname},#{phone})
mapper.select: select count(*) cnt from myuser where id=#{id} and pwd=#{pwd}
select count(*) cnt from myuser where id=#{id}
select count(*) cnt from myuser where phone=#{phone}
